results.content: This course is amazing for kids! Dr Bryson explains everything in simple terms. As a parent, I initially was heavily involved in teaching my son the content and learning the code as well. After, 5 weeks, I found that my son continued the course independently. The simplicity of the content has given my son confidence and a sense of completion. We are looking forward to do more Python and computing courses.
results.content_html: This course is amazing for kids! Dr Bryson explains everything in simple terms. As a parent, I initially was heavily involved in teaching my son the content and learning the code as well. After, 5 weeks, I found that my son continued the course independently. The simplicity of the content has given my son confidence and a sense of completion. We are looking forward to do more Python and computing courses.

results.content: Before taking this course I knew neither coding nor python, this course gave me the fundamentals to start making programs that I did not know how to do before. I hope this knowledge would help me on my journey in programming. Thank you for the help!

results.content: I was never really that interested in coding before, my parents tried whatever they could do for me to enjoy coding, but I was never eager enough to continue. But when they showed me Udemy, I was excited about each and every tutorial and lesson they would bring. The tutorials are short and easy to understand and are put to good use with wonderful programs. I look forward to continuing my learning course in Python.

results.content: The course is great, and easy for any one to understand, even with no coding skills, though one thing seems off it is that instead of using a workspace like py.charm or coding rooms, through the whole course turtle graphics is the only platform used so just a recommendation is that  in the real world we uses platforms to make applications, not only games so you could improve by making your videos about other applications not only games but overall, otherwise its good
